snippet: The French bank said its second-quarter profit rose more than 12 times, to $922 million, from the period a year earlier, after it sold Greek and Italian units that had weighed on its results.
abstract: The French bank said its second-quarter profit rose more than 12 times, to $922 million, from the period a year earlier, after it sold Greek and Italian units that had weighed on its results.

headline.main: Credit Agricole's Profit Soars After Bank Leaves Greece
